ID,

WRITTEN_ENTER_LINE,

LECTURE_SCORE_PUBLISH_NOR,

STOP_CONTENT,

insert into recruit_notice ( ID, THEME_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, ENTER_CONDITION, IS_PUBLISH, REPORT_START, REPORT_END, REGISTER_START, REGISTER_END, INTERVIEW_START, INTERVIEW_END, INTERVIEW_LIST_PUBLISH, INTERVIEW_ENTER_PROPO, INTERVIEW_ENTER_LINE, WRITTEN_START, WRITTEN_END, WRITTEN_LIST_PUBLISH, WRITTEN_SCORE_PUBLISH, WRITTEN_ENTER_PROPO, WRITTEN_ENTER_LINE, LECTURE_START, LECTURE_END, LECTURE_LIST_PUBLISH_NOR, LECTURE_LIST_PUBLISH_ART, LECTURE_SCORE_PUBLISH_NOR, LECTURE_SCORE_PUBLISH_ART, LECTURE_ENTER_PROPO, LECTURE_ENTER_LINE, BODYEXAM_START, BODYEXAM_END, BODYEXAM_LIST_PUBLISH, BODYEXAM_SCORE_PUBLISH, LOOK_START, LOOK_END, LOOK_LIST_PUBLISH, LOOK_SCORE_PUBLISH, SHOW_START, SHOW_END, SHOW_LIST_PUBLISH, SHOW_SCORE_PUBLISH, CONTENT, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, CREATEUSER, MODIFYUSER, REMARK ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{themeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enterCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reportStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registerStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registerEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{interviewStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{interviewEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{interviewListPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{interviewEnterPropo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{interviewEnterLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{writtenStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writtenEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writtenListPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{writtenScorePublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{writtenEnterPropo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{writtenEnterLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lectureStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lectureEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lectureListPublishNor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lectureListPublishArt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lectureScorePublishNor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lectureScorePublishArt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lectureEnterPropo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lectureEnterLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bodyexamStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bodyexamEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bodyexamListPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bodyexamScorePublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lookStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lookEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lookListPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lookScorePublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{showStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{showEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{showListPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{showScorePublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update recruit_notice
ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THEME_ID=#{themeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME=#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME=#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENTER_CONDITION=#{enterCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
/*因为这个下拉框设置为disable参数无法传递，而不可以将1 改为1，所以传递1过来的时候可以改为该值，传0过来就不用改，也不能改*/
IS_PUBLISH=#{isPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPORT_START=#{reportStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REPORT_END=#{reportEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGISTER_START=#{registerStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGISTER_END=#{registerEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INTERVIEW_START=#{interviewStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INTERVIEW_END=#{interviewEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INTERVIEW_ENTER_PROPO=#{interviewEnterPropo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTERVIEW_ENTER_LINE=#{interviewEnterLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WRITTEN_START=#{writtenStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WRITTEN_END=#{writtenEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WRITTEN_ENTER_PROPO=#{writtenEnterPropo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WRITTEN_ENTER_LINE=#{writtenEnterLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LECTURE_START=#{lectureStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LECTURE_END=#{lectureEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LECTURE_ENTER_PROPO=#{lectureEnterPropo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LECTURE_ENTER_LINE=#{lectureEnterLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BODYEXAM_START=#{bodyexamStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BODYEXAM_END=#{bodyexamEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOOK_START=#{lookStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOOK_END=#{lookEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHOW_START=#{showStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHOW_END=#{showEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONTENT=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME=#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYTIME=#{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEUSER=#{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYUSER=#{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP=#{stop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STOP_TITLE=#{stopTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_CONTENT=#{stopContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select t.*, r.theme themeName from recruit_notice t LEFT JOIN recruit_theme r ON t.THEME_ID=r.ID where 1=1
AND r.theme LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND TO_CHAR(r.CREATETIME, 'yyyy') = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY t.CREATETIME DESC
